content.question: Which of the following best explains the author’s decision to place the sentence, “A more qualitative way . . . Armageddon,” at the end of the first paragraph?

choices.label: It enables the arrangement of sentences to mimic the sequence of events described in the paragraph.
It signals a shift in the author’s assessment of the events he describes in the paragraph.
It lessens the likelihood that the description will alarm readers.
It allows the author to justify the description before introducing it.

content.answer: It allows the author to justify the description before introducing it.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
